Package org.apache.logging.converter.config

Interface ConfigurationConverter

public interface ConfigurationConverter
Service class to convert between different logging configuration formats.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    convert(InputStream inputStream, String inputFormat, OutputStream outputStream, String outputFormat)
    Converts a logging configuration file from one format to another.
    Map<String,String>
    getFormatDescriptions()
    Associates each supported format symbol with a description.
    static ConfigurationConverter
    getInstance()
    A default implementation of ConfigurationConverter that uses ServiceLoader to load additional formats.
    Set<String>
    getSupportedInputFormats()
    Returns the list of supported input formats.
    Set<String>
    getSupportedOutputFormats()
    Returns the list of supported output formats.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      static ConfigurationConverter getInstance()
      A default implementation of ConfigurationConverter that uses ServiceLoader to load additional formats.
      See Also:
      • ConfigurationMapper

    • convert

      void convert(InputStream inputStream, String inputFormat, OutputStream outputStream, String outputFormat) throws ConfigurationConverterException
      Converts a logging configuration file from one format to another.
      Parameters:
      inputStream - The input configuration file, never null.
      inputFormat - The input format. Must be one of the formats returned by getSupportedInputFormats().
      outputStream - The output configuration file, never null.
      outputFormat - The output format. Must be one of the formats returned by getSupportedOutputFormats().
      Throws:
      ConfigurationConverterException - If any kind of error occurs during the conversion process.

    • getSupportedInputFormats

      Set<String> getSupportedInputFormats()
      Returns the list of supported input formats.

    • getSupportedOutputFormats

      Set<String> getSupportedOutputFormats()
      Returns the list of supported output formats.

    • getFormatDescriptions

      Map<String,String> getFormatDescriptions()
      Associates each supported format symbol with a description.

      For self-documentation purposes.
